name: 2 COPS KISSING SIMULATOR
description:
This is a game about 2 Cops Kissing. Its a silly idea. No one will play it.

It is for the Butterscotch Shenanigans Game Jam. The theme I used was Sticky Justice, because hey, Cops making out is kinda like Sticky Justice.

Achievements:  Maverick, One Punch Man

If you do like it. Great! I like you! Give me a follow on https://twitter.com/hellovik
